prompt:
Run a content pulse scan using the x-content-scan skill.

Search for posts from the last 3 hours with 100+ likes. Pick 3-4 search queries from the skill's core searches (rotate across runs).

Check data/x-replied.json for deduplication.

Output 1-3 opportunities in the standard format. If nothing worth engaging with, respond with NO_REPLY.

Read the writing style guide if one exists and validate all drafts against banned patterns before output.
notes: Runs every 30 minutes during waking hours. Adjust the hour range (9-21) to match your active hours. Use NO_REPLY instead of forcing weak content.
